title: Japan's Abe apologizes amid cronyism scandal, vows to revise constitution
text:
Japan's Abe apologizes amid cronyism scandal, vows to revise constitution 5:37pm BST - 01:10 
Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe, his ratings in a slump amid a suspected cronyism scandal and cover-up, apologized again on Sunday for causing anxiety and loss of confidence in his government.   
Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe, his ratings in a slump amid a suspected cronyism scandal and cover-up, apologized again on Sunday for causing anxiety and loss of confidence in his government.  //reut.rs/2pIXHED
